Class UserCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • UserCollection

  • public class UserCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserCollection class keeps track of all users. Adds new users to the system. Removes existing users from the system. Manages the user sign-in Displays the users' post
    Author:
    Muhammet Selcuk Guvel

        password - the user's password

      • signin

        public static boolean signin(java.lang.String userName,
                             java.lang.String password)
        Performs an sign in action. Checks whether the user exists who has userName Checks whether the user has true password Sets the user's connection information if everything is accurate
        Parameters:
        userName - the user's userName
        password - the user's password
        Returns:
        true if the user signs in
